.embed-ad{width:100%;text-align:center;clear:both}.embed-ad .vad-player{margin-bottom:25px;z-index:990;position:relative;width:100%}.embed-ad .vad-player .truvid_class{text-transform:uppercase;font:fjalla-one(14px)}.inline_ad{display:inline-block;width:100%;margin:15px auto 25px auto}.adW{text-align:center}.adW.adLc{display:block;margin-bottom:15px}.adW .adC{display:inline-block;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}.adW .adC .adL{font-size:0.7em;padding-bottom:4px;display:block;line-height:1em;text-transform:uppercase;color:#626262}.adW .adC .adA{text-align:center;margin:0 auto;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;-webkit-box-align:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center}.banner{text-align:center;margin:0 auto}.banner img{border:0 none;display:inline-block;height:auto;max-width:100%;vertical-align:middle}.banner-inner-header div{padding:30px 0}.banner-right-column{text-align:center;margin:0 auto;padding-top:30px;padding-bottom:30px}.banner-list-column-bottom{margin-top:30px;margin-bottom:42px}.inline_ad{display:inline-block;width:100%;margin:15px auto 25px auto}#sticky__sidebar{display:none}@media (min-width: 1014px){.adW.adLc{display:none}.inline_ad{display:none}#sticky__sidebar{position:absolute;display:block;float:left;width:160px;height:80%;margin-left:-180px}#sticky__sidebar .sidebar__inner{height:600px;width:160px;position:-webkit-sticky;position:sticky;top:120px}}@media (max-width: 767px){.banner{margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto}}@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1014px){.banner{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}}@media (min-width: 1014px) and (max-width: 1599px){.banner{margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto}.inline_ad{width:664px}}@media (min-width: 1600px){.inline_ad{width:864px}}
